# SKWarpGeometry

**Class**

A definition for a deformation of nodes that conform to [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKWarpable].

## Declaration

```swift
class SKWarpGeometry
```

## Warping

- **SKWarpGeometryGrid**: A definition for a grid-based deformation of nodes that conform to [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKWarpable].
- **SKWarpable**: A protocol for objects that can be warped and animated by an [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKWarpGeometry].

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Inherited By

- SKWarpGeometryGrid

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
